alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:38AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LANCASTER AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 645 AM EDT... At 538 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Cockeysville, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stewartstown around 550 AM EDT. Cross Roads around 555 AM EDT. Red Lion, Brogue and Windsor around 605 AM EDT. Safe Harbor and Shenks Ferry around 610 AM EDT. Yorkana around 615 AM EDT. Hallam around 620 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Winterstown, Fawn Grove, Felton, Washington Boro and East Prospect. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
